title: Login Issues - July 13th
body:
Hi everyone,

We're aware of an issue going on at the moment causing some players to be unable to log in. We're working closely with other teams at Riot to figure out what is going on and resolve. I will provide any updates here.

Thanks for your patience while we work on this.

UPDATE: Thanks for all of your help with the logs everyone, very useful! No need to send any more through.

For a good breakdown of the issue please see Riot Zaps' post below.


**Update 3:38 PM AEST:**
A change has been made that looks like it should resolve the issue for most players! Please let us know if you're still seeing the issue after the time this post was updated!


Some players in other regions may still be unable to log in. Other teams at Riot are currently looking into fixing this for those regions. THIS HAS NOW BEEN RESOLVED.

replies.body:
We've been able to track down where the problem is occurring. When you're logging on to LoL, you're logging on through a system called the Login Queue. This system allows for many players to logon at the same time without overwhelming any particular system. The login queue is accessed through a service called a [CDN (Content Delivery Network).](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Content_delivery_network)

[CDNs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Content_delivery_network) are basically networks owned by companies (third-parties) that have many connection points across different geographic areas and ISPs. We use these to make sure there is a fast response regardless of your ISP or location.

Currently, we're seeing problems with connection points that are used by particular ISPs (Spark and Telstra). At the moment, we're working to get the issues with these connection points fixed, but because there is no direct control by Riot, this can take longer to resolve (and be harder to give an ETA for) than a problem with our own systems.

We're currently working with the CDN to get this resolved as quickly as we can - this is our highest priority.

EDIT @ 2:42PM AEST: 
A few notes below on workarounds that might help you out while we're getting this resolved:

* If you're connected through Telstra:  
    * If you reconnect your modem and force a new connection, you may be directed to a different connection point (described above) when you try to log on to League, and you could get in.
* If you're on Spark or Telstra AND you have a secondary connection / mobile phone internet
      * Because this issue is solely with the logon process through your specific connection - if you go through the logon process with that connection, you can then switch back to your normal connection and then play as normal. **This likely won't work if your phone is through the same **ISP as your normal internet connection. 


EDIT @ 3:38PM AEST:
A change has been made that looks like it should resolve the issue for most players! Please let me know if you're still seeing the issue after the time this was posted!

any closer?
please give me good news
We're still working on getting this fixed - there's no clear ETA yet. I'll keep my post (or the main thread) updated with details once we have them.

Hi folks,

Thanks for the responses so far - we've got a lead that we're working to track down.  It might take a while yet to fully resolve, but the traces and logs you have provided are super helpful!

Cheers
Mindstar

We've got a good lead on what the issue might be and the required fix, but it would be wrong to tell you how long we think it would take to fix as we can't guarantee a timeframe.
That's algoods , could you tell us if it will be done by the end of today ?if you can't tell us a certain time frame ?
Given we're pushing for the fix really hard at the moment, I would expect a resolution today, but I've learned never to promise anything as there may always be surprises.
Yeah would be great. Can we get an ETA? <3 rito{{champion:141}}
this would be great to know lol
We have faith and know you shall fix this almighty Mindstar!
I mean when has riot ever left the players down? XD

Hi folks - to troubleshoot this further it would be great if you can help us out a bit with info from your side:

If you are unable to log in, please do the following steps

* Note what ISP you are using.
* Perform a trace route to prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com
* Perform a trace route to lqak.oc1.lol.riotgames.com
* Attempt to load this URL in a web browser (you should get a 404 error) - https://lqak.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/    - If you get a connection error / time out let us know.
* Get the latest 2-3 logs from C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs  (order by most recent date to get the right one)

[instructions on how to perform a trace route](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169336-How-do-I-run-a-traceroute-)  ** replace "yourdomain.com" with the two URLs above (one at a time)

Send an email with the output of the trace routes above, log files, your ISP, and whether you could load the URL to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

Cheers
Mindstar

dear people requesting a skin for your troubles, you have to understand this isn't a riot problem, it is a CDN problem, this has nothing to do with riot at all, why should they give you something for a problem that isn't their fault?

Thank you to the riot support team for getting on to this promptly, i know how frustrating this is for you guys and gals, you guys are the best.

Hi guys! I've been having the same problem for the past ~2(ish) hours, and I'm with Telstra and I play on a MacBook air.
All I did was I left the league login window open, and I turned my modem off & on. I waited until the internet connection came back on (I knew it was back on when a website on google chrome loaded) and signed in on the league window that was still open. This solved the problem for me.

Also, when I turned my internet off it came up with a message saying something about my patch not installing properly, so just leave that message open until your internet comes back on then click okay, and proceed to signing in.

Hope this works for you guys like it did for me
I'm on Spark NZ too, and i am now logged in, cheers riot for fixing this aye, see you on the rift (if any of you are bronze plebs like me)
I play on OCE server and I live in a different country but i still get affected by the problem even though spark and telstra isn't my ISP (not available in my country).
Can you let us know your ISP and the country you're logging in from?
I'm logging in from the Philippines and my ISP is PLDT(Philippine Long Distance Telephone)

I can log in now after restarting my modem several times.
But the problem still affects my friends who are in the same ISP.
spark is working now cheers

can all of us who commented below get a free kayne?
 that would only seem fair as some of us wanted to play him today but have been cut off and its my only free-day in a while.. also we did nothing to make thiw happen so riot do your part and make me the happiest customer. i bought RP so i could buy a skin for kayne when i buy him but now its gonna take a while... THIS IS THE HOLIDAYS MAN, NOT FAIR :(
It's not Riot's fault if you read the above posts... CDN issue with TELSTRA and SPARK.

I think those of us who are having this issue should be given something in return to compensate for this inconvenience. I'm not asking for much, maybe a key or two. I'm honestly so upset as today is my one and only day I get free time.

Regards,
Your unsalty and patient Summoner.

Lmao. An inconvenience not created by Riot, yet you expect compensation from them, for your lack of free time any other day to play.

Feelsbadman.
We should all be getting free RP because I have been waiting all week to play beucse I have been working and its my day off today and I don't get to play. I think we should get atleast 950rp
How would they know people (like us) were genuinely  inconvenienced tho. they are not going to give free rp to everyone (or anyone) anyway i feel. yes this sucks but its not the end of the world

Two things define you. Your patience when you have nothing, and your attitude when you have everything. 

Riot are doing their best to help us... Just remember that.

Have a good day.

Peace!
